title: FPS below 10 in game
body: Ever since the 11th of December, my in game FPS is stuck under 10. (The client works fine out of game however). I played a couple games earlier that day, and they worked fine. My computer auto-updated at some point, but I'm unsure if that could have anything to do with it. Could someone please help me fix this problem?

replies.body: Having same issue. When I first started with the Mac Client this lag and ping issue has always been there.
